Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.accordion

Interface Accordion

public interface Accordion
Defines the contract for an accordion UI component.

An accordion typically consists of multiple sections or panels that can be expanded or collapsed to show or hide content. Implementations of this interface provide consistent ways to manipulate accordion panels by expanding or collapsing them, as well as checking their state.

Author:

  • Method Details

    • expand

      void expand(SmartWebElement container, String... accordionText)
      Expands specific accordion panels within a given container.
      Parameters:
      container - The container element holding the accordion.
      accordionText - One or more text labels identifying the panels to expand.

    • expand

      String expand(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy)
      Expands an accordion panel determined by a strategy, such as selecting a random or first panel.
      Parameters:
      container - The container element holding the accordion.
      strategy - The strategy for determining which panel to expand.
      Returns:
      A string indicating which panel was expanded, if applicable.

    • expand

      void expand(String... accordionText)
      Expands one or more accordion panels by text label, without specifying a container.
      Parameters:
      accordionText - One or more text labels identifying the panels to expand.

    • expand

      void expand(org.openqa.selenium.By... accordionLocator)
      Expands accordion panels identified by one or more locators.
      Parameters:
      accordionLocator - One or more By locators for the target panels.

    • collapse

      void collapse(SmartWebElement container, String... accordionText)
      Collapses specific accordion panels within a given container.
      Parameters:
      container - The container element holding the accordion.
      accordionText - One or more text labels identifying the panels to collapse.

    • collapse

      String collapse(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy)
      Collapses an accordion panel determined by a strategy.
      Parameters:
      container - The container element holding the accordion.
      strategy - The strategy for determining which panel to collapse.
      Returns:
      A string indicating which panel was collapsed, if applicable.

    • collapse

      void collapse(String... accordionText)
      Collapses one or more accordion panels by text label, without specifying a container.
      Parameters:
      accordionText - One or more text labels identifying the panels to collapse.

    • collapse

      void collapse(org.openqa.selenium.By... accordionLocator)
      Collapses accordion panels identified by one or more locators.
      Parameters:
      accordionLocator - One or more By locators for the target panels.

    • areEnabled

      boolean areEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String... accordionText)
      Checks whether specific accordion panels are enabled within a given container.
      Parameters:
      container - The container element holding the accordion.
      accordionText - One or more text labels identifying the panels to check.
      Returns:
      true if all specified panels are enabled, otherwise false.

    • areEnabled

      boolean areEnabled(String... accordionText)
      Checks whether specific accordion panels (by text) are enabled, without a container.
      Parameters:
      accordionText - One or more text labels identifying the panels to check.
      Returns:
      true if all specified panels are enabled, otherwise false.

    • areEnabled

      boolean areEnabled(org.openqa.selenium.By... accordionLocator)
      Checks whether accordion panels identified by one or more locators are enabled.
      Parameters:
      accordionLocator - One or more By locators for the target panels.
      Returns:
      true if all specified panels are enabled, otherwise false.

    • getExpanded

      List<String> getExpanded(SmartWebElement container)
      Retrieves a list of text labels for accordion panels currently in an expanded state within a container element.
      Parameters:
      container - The container element holding the accordion.
      Returns:
      A list of expanded panel labels.

    • getExpanded

      List<String> getExpanded(org.openqa.selenium.By containerLocator)
      Retrieves a list of text labels for accordion panels currently in an expanded state identified by a locator.
      Parameters:
      containerLocator - The By locator for the accordion elements.
      Returns:
      A list of expanded panel labels.

    • getCollapsed

      List<String> getCollapsed(SmartWebElement container)
      Retrieves a list of text labels for accordion panels currently in a collapsed state within a container element.
      Parameters:
      container - The container element holding the accordion.
      Returns:
      A list of collapsed panel labels.

    • getCollapsed

      List<String> getCollapsed(org.openqa.selenium.By containerLocator)
      Retrieves a list of text labels for accordion panels currently in a collapsed state identified by a locator.
      Parameters:
      containerLocator - The By locator for the accordion elements.
      Returns:
      A list of collapsed panel labels.

    • getAll

      List<String> getAll(SmartWebElement container)
      Retrieves a list of all panel labels within the accordion container, regardless of their expanded or collapsed state.
      Parameters:
      container - The container element holding the accordion.
      Returns:
      A list of all panel labels in the accordion.

    • getAll

      List<String> getAll(org.openqa.selenium.By containerLocator)
      Retrieves a list of all panel labels identified by a locator, regardless of their expanded or collapsed state.
      Parameters:
      containerLocator - The By locator for the accordion elements.
      Returns:
      A list of all panel labels in the accordion.

    • getTitle

      String getTitle(org.openqa.selenium.By accordionLocator)
      Retrieves the title text from a specific accordion panel using a locator.
      Parameters:
      accordionLocator - The By locator identifying the target panel.
      Returns:
      The title text of the accordion panel.

    • getText

      String getText(org.openqa.selenium.By accordionLocator)
      Retrieves the main text content from a specific accordion panel using a locator.
      Parameters:
      accordionLocator - The By locator identifying the target panel.
      Returns:
      The text content of the accordion panel.
